<div class="columns-2">
```{r dsM00}
```
</br> </br>
How often did you **attend** a worhsip service during the last year?
```{r, echo=F}
attendLevels<- c(1:8)
attendLabels<-c( "Never",
                 "Once or Twice",
                 "Less than once/month",
                 "About once/month",
                 "About twice/month",
                 "About once/week",
                 "Several times/week",
                 "Everyday")
attendMetrics <- data.frame(attendLevels, attendLabels)
dplyr::arrange(attendMetrics,-attendLevels)
```
